Description: Day To Day (Oblique) - The Rockets listed Eason as Questionable on Thursday's (Dec. 18) game against the Pelicans.
Out (Ankle) - The Rockets are eyeing January for Finney-Smith to make his season debut, Michael Shapiro of SI.com reports.
Out For Season (ACL) - The Rockets said on Monday (Sept. 22) that VanVleet suffered a torn ACL and may be out for the entire 2025-26 campaign, per Shams Charania of ESPN.
